message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the "Cost of Goods Sold" line item, which represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the period.

In the income statement, the value for "Cost of Goods Sold" is listed as 13,100,000.00.

This is the value I'm looking for, as cost of goods sold directly represents the carrying amount of inventories that were sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '13100000.00'} }
```
